body.title: The First Flexible, Affordable, And Accessible Power Bank Smart Rental Service In Egypt
body.subTitle: ABOUT OCTI VAULT
body.description: Octi Vault Inc. is Egypt based company that provides a charge-on-the-go service for smartphones and other devices. We offer an IoT-based innovative solution to ensure that everyone has access to a charged phone & device everywhere, and at all times.
body.subDescription: Our product benefits both merchants and customers. We provide the public an affordable, reliable, and convenient way to charge smartphones. OCTI portable chargers takes the headache of charging customers’ phones and allows venues to focus on what they do best. It’s the fastest and most convenient solution for people who are on-the-go and need to recharge their battery.
